name: Fiber Twig: Midnight Puzzle
description: Get into the midnight mood â€” build networks of light streams and neon lamps!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 600 Mhz Memory: 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 44 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 1000 Mhz Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A flash classic puzzle where we have to connect batteries & lamps in checkered fields with awkward gas tube parts, trying to seal up all the possible leakages, making the solid outline. New pieces appear periodically on timer, if we don't find the needed parts while the field is being filled up with the spare ones we lose. It feels a little like solitaire & tetris came togather, a calm timewaster. It looks & works fine, it's cheap, can be recommended.
Great game.I like that.Isnt so hard, but isnt so easy. +Graphics -Soundtrack 7/10
